document_data.name: Alley of the Booksellers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Alley of the Booksellers''' was a small but important street in [[Rog'osto]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: Many researchers and [[wizard]]s frequented the Alley of the Booksellers, patronizing the many shops offering books and scrolls for sale. The selection of reading material available here was stocked with selections from all regions of [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Several prominent [[sage]]s lived on the street, selling books and offering their expertise in order to fund their own research.
